sentences: Stann originally joined the band in 1980.
He left to play with Gary U.S. Bonds from 1981 to 1985 before rejoining Southside Johnny.
He currently freelances with other bands.
Joseph’s interest in Holistic Healing began in the late 1960s, is organic, and was born out of personal experiences.

Several years later, early in his career as a professional musician, he began to experience painful arthritis which threatened his ability to perform, as well as making the rigors of touring more difficult.
